nodes.bodyText: The split should happen in the boot stage, and only do match in the runtime.
Put the initialization process in the boot method, rather than there. It is safer and keeps the initialization sequence more clear.
ContextManagerExtendService's instance is controlled by the agent core. This field should not be a static one, like status.
Compiling local, this name format would not pass the CI, because of the format.

        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Fix request url traceId sometimes shows "Ignored_Trace".
          
          
            
            * Fix the default ignore mechanism isn't accurate enough bug.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,6 +19,7 @@ Release Notes.

+* Fix request url traceId sometimes shows "Ignored_Trace".
